content.detailedDescription: For weeks i pointed out this light in the sky to friends and co-workers ...Some said it was the iss,or satellite. i didn't think it was,it wasn't like any star or satellite i have ever seen, it just seemed real close to the earth like it was in the atmosphere not in orbit, over a few days it seemed to get closer to the earth or to my posision so i decided to see if i could get a zoom shot of it, i took 11 pics 7 of them are out of focus or blurred from shaking but still have some value, 4 of them are clear showing the object and the moon, i took the pics facing west toward vancover from mission bc on a upward angle of about40-50 deg. it stayed in the nite sky for about three weeks until i looked up one nite and it was gone ,to the naked eye it just looked like a very bright white lite with a faint pulse to it , it wasn't till about 6 months later i uploaded the pics from the camera to my computer and had a look at them [ hadn't looked at them due to my fathers death in early dec. that year] when i noticed it had a "saturn" like shape to it. then it wasn't till i seen some similar pics on utube i went back to my pics and compared them to ones on utube, it looks exactly like the one from  apollo 16 "we have a boggy at 10 o'clock" video i was shocked at the similarities which led me to doing this report, my only goal with this report is to share what i seen and get a answer as to what it was ? thanks for taking a look at them and if you would like the out of focus ones i gladly send u them if you request them and if you know what it was i would love to know?
content.summary: Was seen in the west skys for weeks took pics on a clear nite with kodak easyshare cam

content.detailedDescription: We were outside smoking a cigarette watching the stars. i noticed a star moving from the south going north. it looked like a statelite but then all of a sudden it turned around and headed back towards the south. it was traveling somewhat slow but then would speed up and was not going straight. it would surve around kind of as it went. it also would become brighter at times then duller again. we were very curious as we did not understand it's flight path. it took about 10 to 12 minutes to fly by both ways and then it just dissapeared over the hills. we were not afraid just very curious. it was about the size of a star.
content.summary: Star coming from the south heading north, turned around and headed back to the south

content.detailedDescription:
Just thought these were interesting..You may have already seen them??

as these are not mine, i cannot agree to release them..Just thought you would like to see them.
content.summary: Please see vids.

content.detailedDescription:
please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). 
the attached image was captured on 2:35:03 pm of 27 nov 2008, from one of two continuous pictures. it appeared in the sky right above my front garden. next picture, one second later.It���s appearance turns out to be completely different from before.

more details: http://ufo-spacelife.Blogspot.Com/2009/12/alien-comes-out-of-ufo.Html
content.summary: Alien comes out of ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was washing the dishes in our kitchen as my wife lara was getting our older son dressed for bed.  suddenly i heard her frantically yelling for me.  i am used to her being scared for things like spiders or ants so it did not cause any special alarm at first.  however, she came running out of the bedroom with her eys bulging out and frantically shaking her hands.  all she could say was that there was something so weird outside that i need to see.  my son, about 3 1/2 at the time was also very scared.  i ran to his bedroom to look out the window and was completely floored by what i saw.  clear as a bell, without any doubt whatsoever, a large diamond shapped object was slowly cruising no more that 100 meters above the ground and about 100 meters out.  it was glowing very brightly and changing colors (blue, red, green and white).  as it moved from our feild of vision i ran out the back door to follow it and was even more amazed when i got there.  i could see details such as panels and that it had a kind of thick antenna on the top of it.  i had the presence of mind to try and capture it on video.  i grabbed my digital camera and did my best.  i have a couple of minutes of footage but it does not do it justice as since there is no zoom it is not detailed.  it appears on film as a small glowing object that can easily be seen changing colors.  if someone has image enhacing capabilities it will be very interesting.

note: my wife has never been even slightly interested in ufos.  she wishes she never saw it because it was so disturbing to her.  my son, now 5 calls it the "bad army airplane," a name he came up with on his own.  he drew a picture of what he saw the next day.
content.summary: Large diamond shaped irridescent object

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with the dogs when i noticed something there in the sky moving to the west. it looked like a black triangle with lights. the size of it was very alarming. i pulled out my glock as a precaution. after my initial shock i became very curious. i activated the laser sight on my glock and illuminated the object. i was suprised that it didnt make a dot on the object but a strange blurry patch. i continued lasering the object for several more minutes as it made its way across the sky. it really seemed to me like it was some kind of massive cargo lifter. but why make it black and fly it at night? i asked several people at the training center here and they told me it was a stealth blimp and to zip it if i wanted to keep my job.
content.summary: Hit the stealth blimp with a laser

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving north on vermillion trail (highway 4) from duluth mn  to our home in gilbert mn  it was after sunset but the sky was not yet totally dark. somewhere slightly north of the whiteface reservoir  we noticed the 3 orange orbs in the sky to the north east. they were orange but at times looked like they were on fire  the orange color was streaked and moving  we had no idea what they were.   much to large to be radio tower lights.  they were moving around each other but staying in roughly the same area in the sky   sometimes one would become smaller and dimmer until it disappeared.   then it would come back. all 3 exhibited this behavior.   we saw them for roughly 10 minutes.  during all this we had  continued driving slowly. and i thought it odd that we didn't drive past them  so they may have been moving with my car because they did stay in the same area of the sky.  the size of them was quite large.  not as large a a full moon  but i had the sense that they were quite close.  i had no fear and and felt quite calm and fascenated by this show in the sky  and was dissapointed when they all 3 winked out and were gone.  my wife and i compared notes and we both saw the same thing and the calm feeling.   i have since been on this road at similar time of the evening hoping to see them again  but no luck.
content.summary: 3 orange orbs large in the sky  moving and fading in and out

content.detailedDescription:
This is regarding  mufon case # 20894 which took place in vermont along rt. 91. i'm pretty sure i saw the same thing that the witness describes, but 5 days earlier. the difference is i give you a identified fly object report, i think i know what i (and the other witness) saw.

i was driving southbound on rt. 91 and was nearing wells river, vt when i saw a line of lights in the sky. they were drifting slowly from east to west and remained in a straight horizontal line. now let me make this clear, i've been researching ufo's my whole life, and i've seen some strange things, but this was really weird. the lights were clearly there, they could be nothing else (no lights reflected into the sky, and so on). i continued going through the list of possibly causes and not finding anything, and meanwhile the lights were drifting slowly. every ten seconds or so, a new light would appear on the west end of the line, and a light at the east end of the line would disappear completely. then i came to a conclusion, and i believe to it be correct.

i think that that these lights (and possibly the others witnessed in the same area of vermont) were nothing more than military flares shot from an aircraft (a la pheonix lights except they didn't last that long). they did indeed appear, just as the witness in case 20894 says, to be drifting and a new one would appear on one end of the line and at the other end one would disappear. they drifted slowly, presumably on the wind. why the military was dropping flares, i couldn't say. 

thank you for your time, and consideration.
content.summary: Several lights in a line over the highway.

content.detailedDescription:
Good evening to you again, it has been a couple of years since i submitted a report from where i lived at the time, (club at tanasbourne) in hillsboro, or. you came out to take a live report, and introduced me to this wonderful software program which matched up the sighting of a ufo chasing a satellite. that was crazy, but i have read other reports and have seen programs on tv where ufo witnesses reported seeing the exact same type ufo, a circle with a clear round hole in the middle. i was taken back by the number of people who have seen this exact same ufo type, since my initial reporting.

anyway, my name is [cms/tg/pid], i live at [cms/tg/pid], in aloha, oregon, just off of blanton off of tv hwy. i watch the skies nightly (when clear), while i take my disabled dog out, several times throughout the night, all night. she had a stroke and needs the intimate care. so be it, i decided to take out my binoculars and just invite whatever is out there to come into view, and hope for the best. normally, i see the same ole satellites and once in a while some type of other dim light scanning across the sky in an erratic trajectory but all i see is a dim light passing as fast as a satellite. anyway, tonight, at about 11:15pm, while out with my dog, i took out the binoculars, and scanned the northern, or north, northeast section of the sky. i looked at the clear view of the stars, watched a few satellites go by, but then something stange caught my eyes. at first, i shrugged it off as just another airplane on final approach heading on into pdx, but, there was something not quite right about this one. it seemed to be much brighter than normal, and the running lights were not the traditional green and red, they were those, and blue, and white and yellow. the craft, which i could not really see, moved up and down, left and right, got bigger and got smaller, and kept changing colors. i thought at first, again, no, it is an airplane, and maybe the weather conditions, or lack thereof, mixing with the extreme cold were playing tricks on my eyes, so i used my former police training, and my fire department training and began to calibrate it���������s location, size, path and pick out specific things that made it stand out.

the first thing was i placed myself against a tree limb in the front yard so i was as still as could be. then i placed my view of it against two trees and an electrical line, basically triangulation. this craft, had to have been about 15 miles away, at an altitude descending from about 15k feet, down to 5k feet. (this is an estimate only), but along it���������s path, it jumped left, then right, then up and then down, headed down, then up and kind of jumped all around. what really helped me at that point was there were two other aircraft (seemed to be interested in this craft, possibly following i don���������t know for sure), they were comparatively very steady, the lights all were where they should be, not jumping around, and the trajectory was a normal aircraft with nothing remarkable in any way. when i compared them, (now behind this vehicle by a few miles but seemed to be closing in slightly), this thing was obviously all over the place. then i got a little better look at it, and what i was able to make out, was that the colored lights were following a triangle shape. the shape was dark black, even more so than the background sky, the lights were in a triangle shape, meaning it appeared they followed the trim of the aircraft, and one bright white light underneath. comparatively to the other two normal aircraft, it had to be a few hundred feet wide easily, and that is very conservative. even the strobing colored lights were 10 times as bright as the other two aircraft in the same trajectory. again, following the trees, the electrical lines, the two rear aircraft were very steady, but the aircraft out front, was very large and jumping all around while the other two were as steady as any other aircraft you watch fly across the sky. so, what do i believe it was, i truly don���������t know, but, in the short time i had to watch, and the fact, it covered it���������s distance to out of sight, from the moment i first saw it, was about 1 to 1.5 minutes. but it was a few minutes i won���������t soon forget.

by the way, my partner [b] and i would still like to become investigators. we were also trained through fema, and the red cross. i am also a tv producer, once in a while, but this has nothing to do with that. in fact, i prefer to keep it separate. however, in the field, investigating, it would be a very useful tool. 	



[cms/tg/pid]


 .
content.summary: Irratic flight path, multicolored lights very large object zig zagging

content.detailedDescription:
While driving alone toward home in the dark about 7:47 pm, northbound on the 15 frwy around baseline ave, fontana, calif, i and surrounding vehicles and those ahead slowed to 50 mph as we all looked up and passed under an unseen, apparently stationary/slow moving object about 30-40 ft wide between a green navigation light on the left and a red navigation light on the right about 50-100 feet above us. it had blinking white lights between the navigation lights like the advertising lights on a blimp, but only blinking on the right side near the red light. i opened the right window - heard no sound.
frwy was too busy to pull off the road from a middle lane. i'd like to know what it was! a lot of people saw it.
content.summary: Ufo above calif i-15 frwy while headed northbound

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the shore of the gulf of mexico watching the sun set. i took out my cell phone and took several shots of my surroundings and the sun. i really wasn't looking at what was in my camera frame at the time because i didn't have my glasses on. a few days later i downloaded the pictures to my computer and found that four consecutive frames had yellow spheres in them. the first one is in the water in front of me. the second is in the water to my left. the third is in the water to my right. the last is in the air going behind a cloud with a red field of light or energy around it. i took several other shots and a couple videos after those four shots and there aren't any yellow spheres in any of them. 

i have blown up these pictures x800 and they appear to have been behind the waves of the water. i personally can't figure out what they are/were and if there was one fast moving or several. willing to show my pictures and cell to anyone but not willing to email them.
content.summary: Yellow spheres

content.detailedDescription: My mother and a friend were driving south on i-5 from oregon to sacramento, ca.  we were about 20 miles north of the sacramento airport when i looked ahead in the darkness to see a very bright light floating ahead of me in the distance.  at first i thought maybe it was a light on a hill or mountain, but there was no mountain or hill in that direction.  i then thought it was a large antenna with a light on top to do with the airport, but as we got closer, it was obvious that there was nothing attached to the bottom.  as we got closer, the object seemed to go from an unusual shape (like the shape of a "p") to a triangle.  as the interstate turned, eventually the object got brighter as we got closer and it ended up being on my right hand side.  at one point, i thought it was a plane beginning it's desent into the airport, but i soon realized that it had stayed in one place the entire time.  since i was driving, i really couldn't look at it for long periods of time.  as i looked to my right, the object was very low with a lot of bright white lights and a shiny metalic color on the side and one blinking red light.  as we past the object, it began to quickly move from west to east across the interstate over us.  i looked in my rearview mirror about 15 seconds later and it was nowhere to be seen.
content.summary: Very bright object with bright white lights

content.detailedDescription: As i was sleeping in my tent i heard a scratching noise and i looked out and saw the ufo. i thought it was mars but it was too big and bright so i concluded it was a ufo. it was about 300 feet off the ground absolutely still and about 250-400 feet wide it also  was a fiery red. i managed to take one photo which is very fuzzy. after it disappeared by fading away at this time i had a ringing in my ears and i was puzzled. i reported it but everyone thought i was crazy. so i came here.
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Red firey sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
Guayaquil, lunes 07 de diciembre del 2009






archivo de imagen y pol���micos de v���deo sin explicaci���n




en la ciudad de salinas, `` mar bravo''provincia de santa elena el d���a 23 de febrero del 2008 a las 15h: 11m. se dio espacio a un suceso indescriptible hallazgo y que no determina una respuesta concreta hasta el momento actual dejando un espacio controversias y pol���micas en el argumento social.
como detalle especifico puedo mencinar, luces extra���as y esfericas con dos colores espec���ficos, verde claro y anaranjadas por encima de las olas en el mar acompa���adas de imagenes humanas, que no puedo describir como se formaban y no me percate si no hasta al subir el video computador, las describo como un fenomeno inexplicable, el video pertenece a formato de telefono celular, sugiero que analizo el mar de v���deo e investigado cuadro por cuadro, por otro lado esta tambien la evidencia mas concreta responde en primer t���rmino a un peque���o fragmento de crustaceo ��� `''concha tambi���n incluye el video aficionado que antes mencionado en los cuales plasman proceso con fisonom���as humanas naturales con identidad referente a t���rminos con un solo contexto, para las personas sostienen con fervor religioso y consideran al caso como una revelaci���n divina y milagrosa.
para los ecepticos simplemente no lo consideran con seriedad y lo divulgan como un enga���o.
lo cierto es que las im���genes guardan mensajes y enigmas ins���litos
la persuasi���n y acontecimientos a partir del hallazgo correspondieron a una serie de entrevistas y cr���ticas cuestionamientos a quien descubri��� este hecho.
aun no se han realizado las investigaciones correspondientes por parte de las autoridades civiles, religiosas y cient���ficas, quiz���s por desconocer el caso o por falta de inter���s en el tema.
por encima de cualquier preconcepto se deber���a tomar el caso con seriedad para definir con cordura y descartar malicias que afecten el aspecto emocional y la integridad de quienes consideran el caso como una revelaci���n religiosa as��� tambien los cuestionamientos que pueden afectar a quien posee la evidencia, en este caso quien narra esta historia, es un dia comun en el cual queria caminar solo por la playa y sentir la briza del mar en mi rostro.
la existencia de las evidencias junto a otro testigo que presenciamos el hecho, es real, nada mas esperan un an���lisis profundo por parte de quienes sustentar puedan y el considerar caso.Les aseguro que puedo someterme una cualquir tipo de analisis incluyendo la evidencia para demostrar que no pretendo enga���ar a nadie.


atentamente:

edwin rivera
content.summary: Dado las circunstacias  del fenomeno, se puede considerar un osni.

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to smoke a cig, looked up because it had started to clear up removing some clouds. when i looked up i saw what looked like a neat looking constellation in the shape of a tryangle. just as i was about to go back inside one of the "stars" started to move, it appeared to me that it was coming closer to earth instead of moving left or right. i wanted to see where it would end up going, so i waited a little bit longer. it suddenly started to move the side where the clouded where, and i was thinking  great now i can't even see it. again, right when i started to head back once again the "star" came out of the clouds and was idle... at this point i thought i was just seeing things. right then the other two "stars" shot the other way going away from the first "star" that moved. needless to say my mouth dropped. the first "star" then went backwards threw the clouds and then shot out to the other two who then spilt up and started going in and out of clouds, almost in a playful like way. i watched for a good 1.5 hours and they just kept moving back and forth. at one point the first "star" almost looked like it was going to hit one of the other ones but didn't then all three just disappear. 

sorry i used to "star" as a way to describe it but that is what they looked like, but obviously didn't act like... 

wow! i will never again question or laugh at ufo sightings. this is one of the coolest things i have ever seen.
content.summary: Three objects were moving and going in and out of clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Witness claims he was abducted from his home, by aliens, when he was in third grade.[ 1959 ]  he claims his grandfather was abducted with him...Two mufon investigators had an interview with the witness on dec 7 2009 at 2:30 pm.  the lead investigator is bill stephenson and the second investigator is ken pfeifer state section director in new jersey.  this case will include many sightings both in philadelpjia and camden new jersey . this case will also involve family members of the witness john holmes.  bill stephenson will fill in all the details and info we have acquired during the interview.  photos will follow per the witness. the interview was recorded by investigator bill stephenson at his home in sicklerville new jersey.  major george filer state director for mufon in new jersey will be contacted for a possible hypnosis session with the witness.
content.summary: This is an abduction case that happened in philadelphia around 1959

content.detailedDescription: I was going to sawyer college in ventura. my sister and brother in law whoi was driving, came and picked me up. i sat in the back seat. it was dark out. we took an old shortcut to santa paula where my sisters house was, called foothill road. i was just thinking about college, and holding my books in the back seat, when we got to the peak of a hill, when i looked out of the window, and say what was very bright, hovering in the sky. it was not too far away from us. i said nothing, and as i stared at the object, i could see what appeared to me, as my eyes adjusted, 8 to 11 spots of very strong light around what looked to be a craft, covered in fog like substance. my sister then looked out the window, and saw the same thing. i was a little scared but curious more. you could see the lights of ventura off in the distance. i wanted my brother in law to stop, but he kept on driving, so i looked at the craft until it was out of sight. later when i moved back to massachusetts where i was from, i was in an emergency room of a hospital, for what i don't remember, but there was this movie on ufo's on the tv> i wrote down all i could about it, and later found out where i could order it. it was not on sale to the public, when i ordered it. it was called ufo's are real! i paid sixty dollars for it. when i started the film, video, i saw what was filmed at the islands of of ventura about forty miles out, where there was this ufo flying at slow speed over them. it was taken by a fisherman, who was out there at there time. there was this one time air force leutenant, who used to see them when flying in aircraft for the air force. they used to film them. one such film was a number of ufo's on the ice, while flying over alaska. i was also interviewed from somebody from the airforce, who told me t6hat he believed what i saw was a real ufo. everytime something was on tv about ufo's i would video tape it, or if i saw a bood on them, i would buy it. i know what i saw, and it was real. i'll even take a polygraph if needed to let people know it was real. yes, ufo's exist!!! i don't care what anybody says. i don't care if the government is covering up there sightings. lucky for us they are not hostile. jesse garon.
content.summary: Coming back home from college when we spotted the ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I saw my third ufo today! i was driving on interstate 81 south, on the way home from a concert at about 7:45 pm (it was dark outside), and i looked to my left from the passenger seat at a mountain range, and saw two lighted objects. the first had one flashing red light on it, and was without a doubt a cell phone tower. but then, slightly to the right and a little higher up (too high to be a type of radio tower of any kind), i saw something wierd. there was what seemed to be an airborne object, with about five or six visible, non-flashing white lights on it. it was very far away, but i believe the lights formed a circle, like a disc shape. i can't be certain. but it was just hovering there for awhile. i thought at first it was a helicopter but it had no flashing lights, and most helicopters would not hover for as long as i saw this hover. i was able to shoot a 20 second video with my digital camera, but it is very poor quality. i will try to post it in the future anyway. i watched it stay there for about 20 seconds, and it disappeared behind the mountain since we were driving and the mountain came between us and it. my father also witnessed it, and could not identify it either. after we passed the mountain, i looked back and saw it for a fraction of a second longer before i lost sight of it totally because of the mountains. i travel that section of interstate 81 several times every week, so i will return to that spot later in the daylight and check for any kind of radio towers that i could have mistaken for a ufo. thanks for taking time to read my report.
content.summary: Strange lights seen hovering above mountain range beside of interstate 81 in tennessee

content.detailedDescription: The craft appeared over the beach in the west suddenly our of nowhere.  it appeared as a lighted triangle with a round outline within the triangle - similar to the hindu sign of a circle in a trianble.  it had white blinking light showing on the top east side and 2 very bright red blinkers on top west side and bottom. the craft was at position angle 1-2, from my position heading south, the craft moved just faster than i could run, approx est speed 20 mph heading south.  the major oddity was i was running south for 15 minutes prior to this object "appearing".  at the blimp speed it would have to come across the ocean which was well light being 3rd night after full moon and tide was way out.  the water was clear and stars were visible.  i blinked and the thing appeared.  i thought it was the moon with a plane crossing its path for a minute, but then thought - wait a minute, where the heck did the moon come from all the sudden. i watched it and put it together that it was a single craft moving south directly off shore, maybe right over the shoreline. flagged a witness who confirnmed he saw the craft too, but it was some distance.  blimps can not appear as this, so it was either stealth and turned on the ilghts, or zoomed into position and quickly! warning zeitgesiters - the shaman can see!
content.summary: Slwo moving craft with blinking red light on top & bottom "appeared" over beach instantly, then moved like a blimp.

content.detailedDescription:
I was born and raised in monterey california as part of a fifth generation monterey family.  i've always questioned everything my entire life.  i always wanted a way to know what was going on with ufos, rosewll, the moon landing, all the wars on the planet, and all the unresolved questions such as ufo sightings, and "are we alone".

the government lies to us about everything.  i can give you a concept to help prove this statement.  

"if you can see ufos with third generation night vision goggles, and you can, then everything else is a lie."  simply question everything from the standpoint that "what you know - ain't so."  ...Now, all you need to do is  look through the night vison goggles and see for yourself.

it was the saturday before october 31st 2007.  ed grimsley came to monterey to show me night viewing with third generation night vision goggles.  shortly after 8pm we went outside and began checking out the sky with the night vision goggles.  after seeing birds, planes, moths, trees, leaves, and getting use to viewing, four fly overs took place in about 10 to 15 minutes.  there were three groups of two and one group of four.  as they flew they remained in perfect formation distance from one another in close proximatry as though they were in perfect unison with one another.

what i saw were craft that resembled a folded 8 1/2 by 11 piece of paper into a delta paper airplane glider.  there was a tail section similar to how you would make the tail on the paper glider just like on an airplane tail.

the craft were low enough to make out their description.  there were wispy cload formations, but mainly clear sky.  it appeared that the craft were visibly under 10,000 feet.  we have a 1,000 foot mountain near by. 

the craft appeared to be enveloped in a wave bubble as there was a distortion field around the craft resembling heat rising.  the craft were angled slightly pitched nose down like riding on the crest of a wave.

the craft crossed the sky from one horizon to the other in about 6 seconds. they made about 4 to 6 sharp angular cuts in straight line formation.  that is to say they traveled in a straight line and abruptly made an angular cut of perhaps 30 degrees then straight on the new trajectory until the next cut.  first cutting one way then back the other way as they crossed the horizon in about 6 seconds.  i computed their speed at roughly 40,000 miles per hour.

the best term to decribe the experience is "surrealistic".  no noise.  ed grimsley was with me and he saw the craft at the same sighting with me.

that evening i stayed up all night.  i did not see anything more dramatic or low.  i did see at least ten addition high flying (100-200 miles) which often did make course changes.  that night ed saw a spherical craft low over housing area near us.  it was the size of a one bedroom house.  i did not see this craft.  but ed seamed very shocked when he saw it. it abruptly shot off.

ed grimsley and i have gone night viewing about 20 times together.  each time people see lights and or craft.  it is my belief from what i have seen myself, and my conversations with hundreds of other people, that the skys are full of craft and the government simply lies about it.  to what end i don't know.  but it has caused me to question things even more than before.  ed and i have shown over 500 people in the monterey area that you can see the craft with third generation night vision goggles.  ed has been doing this since 1996 with the night vision equipment and i imagine has given thousands of people the oppertunity to view.  for more information feel free to contact me directly:


bob oliver 831 383-2676  boboliver9@gmail.Com  www.Edgrimsley.Com
i do the radio show "the bob oliver show, the quantum leap"
www.Krxa540.Com mon8pm sat9pm west oast time.  888 579-2540 live


i have had four other sightings with the naked eye, maybe more.  but, for anyone interested, you definately can see the craft with third generation night vison goggles, every clear night. best viewing time is just after dusk. here is how it works:

1.  our eyes do not operated well.  we see only a limited spectrum of light. therefore everything above and below that spectrum of light is essentially invisible to us.  
2.  during the day when it is bright, we squint because our eyes can't handle all the light.  3.  in fact it is so bright we cannot see the stars during the day. 4.   at night our eyes aren't getting enough light it is hard for us to see thngs.  5.  using night vison allows the electronic equipment to sense much more frequencies of light and image those frequencies into a spectrum we can see as a solid colored visible object.  6.  so what was invisible is now visible.  7.  also illuminated objects stand out brighter in the night vision field, so there are objects we can see with the naked eye at night that are then enhanced with the night vison goggles.

other observations include experiences which lead me to believe these craft and or occupants communicate with us intelligently.  when they are visually sighted, often people including myself feel a connection and and understanding that there is an awareness of being viewed.  even at extreme distances.  figure that one out and let me know!

call me if you want more information. bob oliver 831 383-2676 
it's okay for the public to have my information.  thanks!
content.summary: We see carft every night with thrd generation night vison.   this night we saw lights, a spere, and four fly overs of  formations of delta triangular craft with tail section.  in other sightings, i have seen cigar, and boomerang, and saucer

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out the window waiting for my fiance's papaw to come home, so i can hush the dog when he drives up so my 
fiance would not wake up. then i spoted a close plane and watched it for a minute or two then a big gust of wind hit the house because it was windy, then after the wind stoped i saw a disk shaped light dart away really fast, but it was slower and bigger than a comment and really low. and when it took off it left a light streak behind it for a second then it sucked into the path it shot off too
content.summary: A light disk takes off at light speed

content.detailedDescription: my first ufo sighting was at age 10 when i lived in portland maine. there were 4 other people that saw the ufo when i did. there was a group of us kids out playing hide and seek during the summer of 1982. a  object with 4 inverted triangles appeared just above the tree line.The object appeared to have made some kind of banking/rolling type move at first sight. the object was as big as a house. the four triangles were rotating clockwise, and were outlined with dull red lights.The surface was black with lots of mechanical looking devices all over it. upon further inspection the object or objects appeared to be elongated prisms, each about as long as a yacht. the objects appeared to be in some type of formation.I'm not sure if they were attached to each other, but it did move as one vehicle. they hovered there for about 5 minutes not making any sound at all. the group of kids i was with started yelling"oh my god, it's a ufo." we all got on are bikes, when the object began to move south at a slow crawl, and followed it as far as our tiny legs could pedal. it was the most incredible experience i have ever had in my entire life. i will never forget it. we went back to the same spot where we first saw the ufo, and there was a black helicopter flying low with search lights. they seemed to be looking for something or someone.It's been 28 years ago since i have been in contact with the other witnesses.
content.summary: This is my ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: A friend called me and told what he was seeing and the area it was happening so i went driving to that area of town. it's very dark out and very clear skies so we can see well. start noticing these triangles forming some huge some small but several of them.They look exactly like stars besides a few which were flashing red.These triangles would start connecting and then reassemble into larger or smaller shapes. at the base of some of them were the red flashing lights that would stay stationary for a minute or two then they would fly in different directions with strange flight patterns.These red lights would then connect to other triangles then be stationary again for a while.This went on for ten to fifteen minutes then simply stopped.This was on dec.5,2009 around 10:00 p.M. up to seven days prior the same things had been sees by other people but this was the night that i had seen them for myself.It was very exciting and so real that i still can't calm down about it so i contacted you guys and maybe we can all make some sense of it.
content.summary: Stars forming several triangles and patterns then disappearing. some were flashing red the others just looked like normal stars.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling southbound on i-65 near mm 158 when i noticed a strange v shaped cloud which looked like it had a head on it.

i took a sequence of aprox 10 photos at about 1 second intervals of the cloud and didn't see the diamond shape object until after reviewing the photos. i was driving at the time so i have idea what happened to the object.

since then i have noticed more of these objects that just kind of pop-up and disappear very quickly and are completely silent. so fast in fact that if hadn't actually caught one with my camera i would not know what i was seeing.

diamond2.Jpg is the same photo as diamond1.Jpg except cropped. vcloud.Jpg was taken about 1 sec before the shot that actual diamond shaped object appeared in.
content.summary: Diamond shape ufo emerges from v-shape cloud.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my easy chair watching tv, i saw a bright white flash go by my two living room windows. not a  butterfly, bird, or insect. it was going from west to east. the incident only lasted an instant. i saw the white streak above my glases which are only 1 2/1 inches high. used for reading and driving and sonetimes for watching tv. i noticed the bright white light because it was only an inch or so below the rain drip above the windows. i saw it out of the corner of my eye and followed its cource through the second window. there was no way i could miss it. only a bright white streak. like a falling star but on a horizontal trek, instead of a vertical descent. i was only suprised to see this object during the daylight hours. usually i see things like this in the  night time. i lost sight of the object as it continued on past the window behind the wall. i knew there would be no use to go look outside for it because it would be gone.
content.summary: Saw something flash past two windows in my living room.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a look at the stars with my binoculars while visiting carlisle, pa. at approximately 9:30 pm. sky was completely clear, moon was 3/4 full and there was very little unnatural light in this area, which made it a particularly good spot for sky watching as opposed to my home in the city. after spotting a very bright star through my binocs, i brought them down from my face to view the star/planet with my naked eye when i see (2) black "boomerang" or "chevron like" crafts (the size of 2 stealth bomber jets each) flying extremely low, side by side (but 1 was slightly behind the other in formation).They each had 1 very dim, round, greenish/yellow light on each wing tip (so 2 total lights per craft that blended in with the stars in the night sky so well). they were moving almost as if they were gliding through the sky, but at extreme speed. so fast in fact, that before i could bring my binoculars up to my face to see better details, they had zipped over our house and over the neighborhood, out of sight! these 2 objects were completely silent and produced zero vibration, which was shocking due to how low they were flying. had i not been looking up in the sky at that very moment and seen them, i would've had no idea they were even there. that's how "stealth" these objects were! they were all black in color and didn't have a body or passenger/pilot cabin area at all (almost drone like). i described these objects as "boomerang", or "chevron like", but in reality they were a unique shape that i had not seen before, but those words would describe these crafts best. i have seen many planes fly over my home and my families over the years and living close to west point, ny and growing up here in pa by the army war barracks, also visiting military air bases all over the country to visit friends in the past, but i've never seen anything like this! the basic physics of these crafts did not fit in with our current technology (even "secret ops" that have been leaked to the public)just because of the height in which they were flying (very low) and their size, to cause no sound or vibration whatsoever was the most amazing thing about the whole sighting! you expect to hear or feel something (even a breeze??) when 2 objects the size of 2 stealth bombers each, fly over the roof of your house that low! it's a mystery! this was my first real sighting where i was able to see the crafts up close and personal to give a description. i went outside several more times over the night, through 5am and never saw anything else like what i had seen earlier. thanks:)
content.summary: 2 black boomerangs w/ dim lights low flying silent almost invisible!

content.detailedDescription:
In october, while going over some photos that i had taken back in july, i found a strange object above a tree in the photo. i took two pictures within one half second from each other of the sky which contained the top of a tree and some clouds in the back ground.  the photos were taken with a canon xs dslr at an f-stop of 5.6, using 70-300mm zoom lens.  weather conditions were typical of a south texas afternoon in july.  

i was taking random test shots of the area to include the nice looking clouds, tree tops and my kids.  

the first photo attached does not contain anything.  the second photo contains a small spect above the tree towards the middle.  after zooming in, i noticed that it looks saucer shape but could not identify the object.  the reason i beleive it is strange is because the object does not appear in the first photo, which was taken about half a second before the second photo.  keep in mind that it took me about four months to find it as i did not realize what i had captured until the day i was tranferring photos to my hard drive.

the loaction is asherton, texas, which is about 150 miles southwest of san antonio, texas and 8 miles south of carrizo springs, texas. the direction of the camera shot is in a southeast direction. i have enclosed gps coordinates.

gps: 28.456298
    -99.758327
content.summary: Ufo found in photo in airspace above asherton, texas

content.detailedDescription:
My partner and i were heading out for dinner around 6:00pm. it was quite dark, and the sky was crystal clear. the milky way was quite bright above us. as we walked to my car, we both were startled to see three strange lights low on the horizon, just above the tree line (which was about 40 feet from us), in the southwestern sky. 

the lights were close together, all the same size, and heading away from us at about a 45 degree angle. we probably would have dismissed it as a plane if we hadn't been struck by how odd they looked. they were large yellow/orange lights (not the usual white), fixed in a row, looking like they were part of one craft, but there were no flashing lights. nor did it have either red or green lights of any kind (that we saw, at least). when we first saw the lights, i would estimate that - holding a ruler at arms length - the lights measured (end to end) a bit more than a 1/4".

i had time (and the presence of mind) to run back into the house and grab my binoculars, which gave us a good look at it. it didn't look like it was any higher than many of the "local" traffic (i'm sorry, i'm not a pilot, so i have no reference as to how low our local traffic flies - but think prop plane flying between two small airports 50 miles away - like that.) but the lights were too large and far apart to be a small plane. 

the other odd thing about it was that it was traveling rather slow... this may be because it was flying away from us, but the rate at which the object "shrank" as it moved away didn't seem to be very fast (when compared to how local traffic at that height and trajectory recede). 

so far as sound, hard to tell. there were a couple of other aircraft in the sky at thetime, one of which was making a typical jet noise, plus we have three huge windmills on the ridge to the south of us (half a mile away) that tends to give a low whoosh-whoosh sound. but, it didn't "seem" to be making any noise from where we stood.

with in a minute or two the object's trajectory took it behind the trees and ridge. we spent most of our dinner going over what we saw. i was struck by how similar the object looked to the one that was reported on 11/30, down along route 295. my educated guess would be that the object we saw was within visual range of the coast line (most flights traveling a north/south trajectory love to use the coastline as their "highway"), and was moving along the same line (southwesterly direction) as the sighting on 11/30. 

a little background on location: we have a fair amount of low level air traffic over our property, considering we live in the maine woods. traffic from bangor international airport, as well as the national guard facility there, come right over us as they head for the coast line. we also get small jets and prop planes going back and forth from augusta, bangor, etc to the coast (i.E little airports in belfast and islesboro). we also get a lot of high altitude traffic from what i am guessing is ottawa, montreal and quebec, canada, heading out over the atlantic. plus, i grew up in nyc, so... in short... i know what a plane looks like.

i am an artist, so my visual memory is pretty darn good. plus, i have a bs in environmental sciences, so i also have an analytical, science-trained, questioning mind. i try not to jump to conclusions, especially around such a difficult subject like ufos. while i am convinced that there are strange things afoot that truly can't be from around here, i believe i've never seen a "real" ufo (i have, however, seen a fair number of "unusual" air craft over the years).  would i call this a ufo? well, it was definitely unidentifiable by myself and my partner, and it was a flying object. but that's as far as i'm willing to go.
content.summary: Three lights in a row, none blinking, like 11/30/09 sighting reported in maine.

content.detailedDescription:
11-22-09 at 6-7pm in vermont: i-91 runs (roughly) north and south along the connecticut river (n->s) between vermont and new hampshire..  rt.113, runs west over i-91 at exit 14, about 1/2 between the top and bottom of vermont. 

perfectly clear night. lots of stars. great, unseasonably warm weather -- not even a light jacket! 

first, driving n on 91 between exits 13 and 14: behind the trees; a low line of  lights. i think: "towers" - no, not towers.  "plane" - no, too low and not moving fast enough. huh. we are discussing the new tv show "v". i am listening to the kids, and watching these lights, trying to figure out what is causing them....  wonder what that is... then --- 

it  disappears. totally gone.  i say out loud to my kids: 
"that's just not right!!" obviously, light "disappearing is not "normal". my two children, young teens, both saw the lights and agreed;  just not normal for them to disappear like that..... .  

drove along, thinking about this.... and the road turns a bit, and there they are - again....A perfect line of lights -- just appears again.... this time in full view over the highway.  3 to 4 cars had pulled over to watch. 

it was 4 white lights in a line; perfect, equi-distanace from each other, traveling slowly, and close to us / although, i wasn't worried about anything "bad" happening.  

the last light (right side -goes off -- gone.  the first, farthest left light, shoots out a light to the left; which stops, equi-distance from the other ones; keeping the perfect formation.

then, another farthest right light disappears. just gone.  the farthest left light shoots another light out to the left; creating the same line of a perfect 4 lights - all equi-distant from each other; all moving slowly to the left (west)...  keeps doing like this.. while we are trying to figure out what's doing this??? 

then, gone.  just gone.  we pulled behind another family to compare notes. they didn't see it "take off" either.   "just gone!"    bizz-aarrrr!!! 

very fascinating.  wish we could see it again.  still wondering. 

lots of people saw this...
content.summary: First, low line of  lights behind trees. disappears.Totally gone. obviously not "normal".  then, line of lights appears again....

content.detailedDescription: Seen unit flying  towards me at about 300-400 feet and stop right above me and i stoped my truck put window down and it sat above me for approx 4 seconds, no noise at all . no jet wash no prop noise, lights of some sort on bottom approx a row of two twelve to fourteen on bottom. i was a mainline jet mechanic for us-airways, i know what jet wash is and there was no noise at all.
content.summary: A plane twice the size of a herrior jet
